mapper.select: select a.`id`, a.`title`, a.`item_pic_url`, b.`market_price`, a.`goods_id`, a.`sort_order`, a.`subtitle`, a.`assist_count`, a.retail_price as retail_price from nideshop_goods_bargain a left join nideshop_goods b on b.id = a.goods_id where a.id = #{id}

select count(*) from nideshop_goods_bargain WHERE 1=1
AND name LIKE concat('%',#{name},'%')
